scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: cd client && npm install --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
